titles.title: To extend the benefits of the weatherization assistance program under part A of title IV of the Energy Conservation and Production Act to Puerto Rico and the United States Virgin Islands.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 2/26/2004--Introduced. Amends the Energy Conservation and Production Act to extend the low-income weatherization assistance program to Puerto Rico and the United States Virgin Islands.
